content: Actually, I almost went down the path of researching butterflies.\nWhen I'm reading,\nI'm often greeted by a butterfly landing on me to rest.
info: 幻雪关于收集昆虫闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: I would often crouch near flower beds,\nobserving butterflies with their mesmerizingly colorful wings.\nIt's one of the most vivid scenes etched in my childhood memories.
info: 幻雪关于收集昆虫闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I rather envy those summer days of young insect collectors,
but I simply cannot...
The horns on kabuto beetles are rather intimidating.
info: 幻雪关于收集昆虫闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: I couldn't help but carefully study their gently fluttering wings... (Achoo!) Only to discover I'm allergic to the scales' powder!
info: 幻雪关于收集昆虫闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
